content: Fix admin panel authentication and duplicate instance issues
Add canvas management tab to admin panel for monitoring tile sizes and grid layouts
Create comprehensive reference documentation for admin panel implementation
Fix critical pixel data bleeding bug where pixel data from one tile could corrupt other tiles
Fix tile size mismatch between frontend and backend causing coordinate calculation errors
Make tile editor flexible enough to work with different tile sizes (32, 64, 128)
Update database to set all existing canvases to tile_size: 32 to match actual tile data
Test complete tile editing flow to ensure no more pixel data corruption or coordinate errors
